lea.text: In my team we know where and how to address roadblocks

pro.text: In my team we know our users and maintain an active dialogue with them

tco.text: In my team we do have a regular sprint planning and review

tcu.text: We do have quick and easy access to all information we need for our work
We are involved to the right degree (neither too much nor too little)

tpe.text: In my team we do believe in ourselves

vis.text: I know my teams business targets
